sources.title: Sherlock Holmes (2009) | Full Movie
sources.description: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's famous detective faces the ultimate challenge when enormous monsters controlled by a reckless mastermind attack London.

metadata.Plot: After finally catching serial killer and occult "sorcerer" Lord Blackwood, legendary sleuth Sherlock Holmes and his assistant Dr. Watson can close yet another successful case. But when Blackwood mysteriously returns from the grave and resumes his killing spree, Holmes must take up the hunt once again. Contending with his partner's new fianc√©e and the dimwitted head of Scotland Yard, the dauntless detective must unravel the clues that will lead him into a twisted web of murder, deceit, and black magic - and the deadly embrace of temptress Irene Adler.
metadata.Writer: Michael Robert Johnson, Anthony Peckham, Simon Kinberg
metadata.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Rachel McAdams
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 10 wins & 31 nominations total
